column1: WEST BUTTERWICK - CROFT HOUSE and GLEN HOWE
# Croft House may be at 12 School Lane, SE834059, but not marked on the map.
# In March 1945, the gauge moved to Glen Howe, which seems to be grid reference given on the 1950s sheet, and used here.
# The station continued until 1979 according to MIDAS.
